value:
$WmMPID_ライ,ch11_10_Lay_M_Normal,Face|...And with that, you're all caught up
on the situation here in Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_Normal,Face|We haven't been here long, so there
hasn't been time to gather as much
intel as I'd like...$k$p$WmMPID_カイネギス,ch11_13_Caineghis_M_Normal,Face|What you brought is good enough to
inform how we proceed. Your keen
eyes and ears have served us well.$k$p$WmMPID_ライ,ch11_10_Lay_M_Normal,Face|It's an honor to receive your praise,
Your Majesty.$k$p$WmMPID_カイネギス,ch11_13_Caineghis_M_Normal,Face|Of course. Thanks to you, I've
reached my decision.$k$pWe laguz of Gallia will fight side by
side with the Kingdom of Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_Normal,Face|As you command, Your Majesty.$k$p$WmMPID_ライ,ch11_10_Lay_M_Normal,Face|Right. The Order of Heroes has wide
popular support, which shows the
Askran royals must be good people.$k$p$WmMPID_カイネギス,ch11_13_Caineghis_M_Normal,Face|Indeed. And beyond that, I sense no
ill intentions from their summoner,
$Nu.$k$pBut perhaps most importantly, the
Greil Mercenaries who arrived before
us have given the Askrans their trust.$k$p$WmMPID_ライ,ch11_10_Lay_M_Normal,Face|Right. That, more than anything else
we've found, proves that the people
of Askr are worthy of our trust.$k$p$WmMPID_モゥディ,ch11_12_Mordy_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_レテ,ch11_11_Rethe_F_Normal,Face|What's wrong, Mordecai? Does our
king's decision not sit right with you?
Now's the time to speak up!$k$p$WmMPID_モゥディ,ch11_12_Mordy_M_Normal,Face|No, no. It is not like that. Mordecai
agrees Askr needs our help.$k$p$WmMPID_ライ,ch11_10_Lay_M_Normal,Face|Hm...$k$p
